first_para: Michael Vincent Dugher (26 April 1975) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Barnsley East since 2010. He is currently Vice-Chair of the Labour Party, deputy to Jon Ashworth, and Shadow Secretary of State for Transport

full.extract: Michael Vincent Dugher (26 April 1975) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Barnsley East since 2010. He is currently Vice-Chair of the Labour Party, deputy to Jon Ashworth, and Shadow Secretary of State for Transport
full.title: Michael Dugher
